title: HELP!
body: My mouse works perfectly fine before I start a game. But when the game starts I right click to move but the four green arrows go to the middle of my champion. I cannot skim the map, move, move my ults and escape the game because whenever I click it goes to the middle of my champion. I have to command+tab(I'm using a Macbook Air 13 inch) to get out of LoL and quit the game. It started a day ago when I just downloaded Wacom tablet driver for my tablet(I play Osu!). Can anyone help me?!

replies.body: Have you tried uninstalling the drivers and playing?
